sw-product-detail-review-summary.title: Review summary
sw-product-detail-review-summary.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this summary? This cannot be undone and you will have to generate a new summary.
sw-product-detail-review-summary.aiWarning: AI responses can be inaccurate or misleading.

emptyState.title: No review summary yet in the current language
emptyState.text: Based on all available product reviews, AI Copilot can generate a review summary. The summary will be displayed in the storefront above the reviews to help the user to identify the most important critiques without reading through all reviews.

alerts.successTitle: The review summary was generated successfully
alerts.successText: You can do a proofreading and make adjustments as desired or renew the text using the phrasing option. Please save your text beforehand because "Renew text" will overwrite the current text.
alerts.errorTitle: The review summary could not be generated
alerts.errorText: The service is unavailable at the moment. Please try again later.

actions.renewOverrideWarning: CAUTION: This will override the current text.

sw-review-list-summaries.title: Review summaries for all products
sw-review-list-summaries.infoText: Based on all available product reviews, AI Copilot can generate a review summary. When using "Start generating" all products which have a sufficient amount of reviews will get a review summary.
sw-review-list-summaries.minFieldHelpText: Minimum number of reviews per product to generate a summary

alerts.successText: The generation was now started and will create {amount} summaries. It will be running in the background. You can continue working with the administration.
alerts.errorText: The service is unavailable at the moment. Please try again later.
